TextLibrary.Text: So you're the ones to pick up the Cobalt Magnifier? That'll be 2,000 credits.
So you're the ones to pick up the Cobalt Magnifier? That'll be 2,000 credits.
2,000!? Isn't that a little steep? Furthermore, what happened to your legs!?
2,000!? Isn't that a little steep? And, um, shouldn't you have legs?
Yes, but believe me, we're selling at way below cost here. And as for the legs, it is a tragic but long story.
Yes, but believe me, we're selling at way below cost here. And as for the legs, it is a tragic but long story.
We will just have to find the money for it then.
We will just have to find the money for it then.
